Core Capabilities

Built for Scale

Six powerful features that make SwarmForge the leading platform for AI agent orchestration.

Multi-Agent Collaboration

Agents work together, share context, and coordinate tasks automatically.

  • Context sharing
  • Role specialization
  • Task delegation

Real-Time Monitoring

Watch your swarms work with live logs, progress bars, and status updates.

  • Live execution logs
  • Progress tracking
  • Performance metrics

Enterprise Security

SOC 2 Type II compliant with end-to-end encryption for all data.

  • SOC 2 compliant
  • End-to-end encryption
  • Data isolation

Visual Workflow Builder

Design complex agent workflows with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

  • Drag-and-drop canvas
  • Visual connections
  • Conditional logic

API & Integrations

Connect with 100+ tools including Slack, Notion, Salesforce, and more.

  • 100+ integrations
  • RESTful API
  • Webhooks

Human-in-the-Loop

Set approval gates and manual checkpoints for critical decisions.

  • Approval workflows
  • Manual checkpoints
  • Escalation rules
And More
